Item.Description: The organization uses personally identifiable information (PII) internally only for the authorized purpose(s) identified in the Privacy Act and/or in public notices.
Item.Example: The usage of PII is limited to accepted personnel and tasks only.
Item.Testing_Procedures: Obtain data privacy policy and procedures; other relevant documents or records and ascertain if the organization uses personally identifiable information (PII) internally only for the authorized purpose(s) identified in the Privacy Act and/or in public notices.
